solution.text:
Check if given sides satisfy Pythagoras Theorem
Square all the side and check whether sum of the square two side is equal to square of third side or not
Foe example
_{{3*i}}_, _{{5*i}}_, _{{4*i}}_ :
\(_{{3*i}}_^2, _{{5*i}}_^2, _{{4*i}}_^2\)
_{{pow((3*i),2)}}_ , _{{pow((5*i),2)}}_ , _{{pow((4*i),2)}}_
Now, we can see that in this case, sum of two is equal to third.
i.e., _{{pow((4*i),2)}}_ + _{{pow((3*i),2)}}_ = _{{pow((5*i),2)}}_
Similarly check others
